XOSD Struct Reference

#include <xosd.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

The XOSD driver instance data. An instance must be allocated for each OSD device in use.


Public Attributes

XOSD_Config Config
u32 IsReady
int InstructionInExternalMem
